title: 92/301/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 May 1992 approving the programme for the eradication of bovine brucellosis presented by Portugal and fixing the level of the Community's financial contribution (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 22 May 1992  approving the programme for the eradication of bovine brucellosis presented by Portugal and fixing the level of the Community's financial contribution  (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)  (92/301/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The programme for the eradication of bovine brucellosis presented by Portugal is hereby approved for a period of three years.
Portugal shall bring into force by 1 May 1992 the laws, regulations and administrative provisions for implementing the programme referred to in Article 1.

Financial participation by the Community shall be at the rate of 50 % of the costs of testing and those incurred in Portugal by way of compensation for owners for the slaughter of cattle because of bovine brucellosis.
The Community financial contribution shall be granted after the supporting documents have been supplied.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 May 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
